name: Verenica
description: Verenica is a third-person, action-adventure, bullet-hell survival arcade game where the Player takes on the role of Verenica, the game’s protagonist. The Player should survive mobs of enemies and their respective bosses in order to clear the level. As they complete each level phase, they acquire a certain amount of shop points (based on their remaining health) to buy potions that enhance their performance in the next rounds. In this way they are able to reach the end of the level and slowly complete the game.
